title: Senior Draughtsman (CAD /AutoCAD / Inventor ) Agriculture , Construction , Mining Machinery Manufacturing Ind
description: Company in Boksburg that Provides Advanced Tailings Treatments Solutions to the Mining and Chemical Industries. Role for Draughtsman and materials inspections. The Draughtsman will be responsible for creating detailed Technical Drawings and Plans, preparing designs using CAD software, collaborating with engineers and project managers, visiting suppliers to perform inspection (Quality and dimensional) and ensuring compliance with Industry standards. The role also includes revising designs and drawings based on feedback and overseeing project timelines to ensure deadlines are met.
responsibilities: Creating detailed Technical Drawings and Plans
Collaborating with engineers and project managers
Visiting suppliers to perform inspection (Quality and dimensional)
Revising designs and drawings based on feedback
Overseeing project timelines to ensure deadlines are met
qualifications: Diploma or Degree in Engineering, Draughting or a related field
Experience in producing Engineering drawings and designs
Strong Understanding of Engineering principles and manufacturing processes
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects
Experience in the Mining or Chemical industry is a Plus
Solid / Liquid separation background will be a Huge plus
